授業目的: The purpose of this course is for students to develop scientific literacy with concepts of physics, and to study recent research topics in physics. The content is at an introductory level, and non-majors in physics are encouraged to attend.
到達目標: Students will be able to understand how to explore the scientific principles of physics with concrete natural phenomena.

トピック.授業計画1: This course consists of two major parts. The first part is for introductory physics in which students study some basic theories and/or experimental techniques in physics. The second part is given in an omnibus form for advanced topics of physics.

評価.教科書Required texts0: There is no textbook for this course. Some references may be given if necessary.
成績評価Grading0: 評価基準等　Grading Criteria etc.
